text: (Those who disbelieve) the disbelievers of Mecca: Abu Sufyan and his host (say) to the lowly among people: (Shall we show you a man who will tell you (that) when ye have become dispersed in dust with most complete dispersal) such that the skin and bones are separated from each other, (still, even then), Muhammad claims (ye will be created anew) the spirit will be given back to us after death?
